body:
Dear All,



I am unable to find a source link where i can learn how to simulate UDI of an interior space using Grasshopper. I intend to analyse the UDI (or equivalent) created by skylights in a museum gallery and then wish to optimize its size and shape to maximize natural lighting but not exceed solar heat gains.



I have attached my up-to-date work for your review.



Kind Regards,

Porus
topic: Analyse UDI(useful daylight illuminance) of an interior space.
